effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 367,205 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 175,230.
Set: Casting Renewing Mist applies Insurance! for 6 sec. The healing of Insurance! is increased by up to 50% in proportion to the coverage Renewing Mist has on you and up to 10 allies.

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and opponent's failed interrupt attempts grant Precognition

spells.description: Use: Offer to bind your spirit with that of another player also wearing this ring. This binding is permanent, but can be severed at the cost of 1 Blasphemite. (2 Min Cooldown)

Equip: Your spells and abilities have a chance to empower each unique gem color of an ally's socketed gems. This boon grants 391 to each empowered secondary stat for 15 sec. This effect will always target your bonded ally, if able.
Equip: Your spells and abilities have a chance to grant 7,831 primary stat for 20 sec.

effects.display_string: Set: Increases your Intellect by 10% and your Stamina by 15% when in Arenas, Battlegrounds, and War Mode.

spells.description: Use: Removes all movement impairing effects and all effects which cause loss of control of your character. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

effects.display_string: Set: Increases your Intellect by 10% and your Stamina by 15% when in Arenas, Battlegrounds, and War Mode.

spells.description: Equip: Your gear cools with Woven Duskthread and gains 756 Versatility when over 80% health.

spells.description: Equip: You champion the cause of Stormwind.  All reputation gains while in dungeons will be applied to your standing with them.
